name: react-social-media

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd server && npm run apollo" "cd client && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run start" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.install: cd react-social-media && npm install && cd ../server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Aeryk Andrews, Christopher Bartlett, Kelly Boyd, Jessica Linex, Apollo Vavra
